CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
OldVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for iPad
CurrentVersion.description: OneNote Copilot on iPad is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the iPad, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on iPad is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for iPad
OldVersion.description: OneNote Copilot on iPad is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the iPad, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on iPad is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: OneNote Copilot on Mac

It’s designed to work seamlessly on the Mac, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on Mac is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
OldVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pin favorites at the top in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Easily access your most-used folders by pinning them at the top of your Left Nav Bar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This feature streamlines navigation, ensuring your important folders are always within reach. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pin favorites at the top in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Easily access your most-used folders by pinning them at the top of your Left Nav Bar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This feature streamlines navigation, ensuring your important folders are always within reach. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
OldVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description: This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
CurrentVersion.description: This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
OldVersion.description: This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC, GCC High and DoD environments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC, GCC High and DoD environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC, GCC High and DoD environments (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC, GCC High and DoD environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
OldVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
OldVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: DVR (Digital Video Recording) capabilities for town halls on desktop and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now interact with an instance of a live streaming town hall instance in the same way they would a recorded piece of content when viewing via desktop or web. DVR functionality in town hall enables event attendees to pause and move forward or back within a town hall, navigate to any previously-streamed timestamp, and other abilities that make interacting with a town hall more convenient and makes it easier to digest the content being presented. This feature is available for all town halls regardless of the license assigned to the organizers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: DVR (Digital Video Recording) capabilities for town halls on desktop and web
OldVersion.description: Users can now interact with an instance of a live streaming town hall instance in the same way they would a recorded piece of content when viewing via desktop or web. DVR functionality in town hall enables event attendees to pause and move forward or back within a town hall, navigate to any previously-streamed timestamp, and other abilities that make interacting with a town hall more convenient and makes it easier to digest the content being presented. This feature is available for all town halls regardless of the license assigned to the organizers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
OldVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
CurrentVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
OldVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
OldVersion.description: In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
CurrentVersion.description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
OldVersion.description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
CurrentVersion.description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
OldVersion.description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
OldVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
OldVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
OldVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps, creating a consistent ‘open file’ experience. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated welcome screen for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 app welcome screen on Windows will be updated to display a welcome message and progress bar while the Microsoft 365 app loads.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enterprise News Reader
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, user’s followed sites, frequent sites and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot powered news summary as well, available in desktop only in this initial release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: End user cards in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Employees can now create their own cards that connect to other tools and destinations on Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
CurrentVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot for Microsoft interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.

Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: DVR (Digital Video Recording) capabilities for town halls on desktop and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now interact with an instance of a live streaming town hall instance in the same way they would a recorded piece of content when viewing via desktop or web. DVR functionality in town hall enables event attendees to pause and move forward or back within a town hall, navigate to any previously-streamed timestamp, and other abilities that make interacting with a town hall more convenient and makes it easier to digest the content being presented. This feature is available for all town halls regardless of the license assigned to the organizers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
CurrentVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
CurrentVersion.description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
CurrentVersion.description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated welcome screen for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 app welcome screen on Windows will be updated to display a welcome message and progress bar while the Microsoft 365 app loads.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enterprise News Reader
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, user’s followed sites, frequent sites and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot powered news summary as well, available in desktop only in this initial release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: End user cards in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Employees can now create their own cards that connect to other tools and destinations on Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
CurrentVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot for Microsoft interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.
